title: Trinity College President on Return to Classes
itunes:title: Trinity College President on Return to Classes
description:
Trinity College President Joanne Berger-Sweeney discusses returning to classes and efforts to diversify the student body. She walks through how the school is pivoting amidst the pandemic and points to the importance of acting empathetically during this time.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
